title: Need your help!!
author: qberweb

comments.content: It must be **[Before the Rain](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132001/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Before%20the%20Rain%20-%20Th&fid=7c99dfc9937e74d847d61324846b8ce5&fstyle=b&fsize=48&text=La%20Vida%20es%20Bella&fit=1)** by Måns Grebäck (Free for personal use) probably emboldened
fvilanakis, thanks a lot, I've been looking for a long
